title: UK survey : when most consumers will start their Christmas shopping in the UK in 2013
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Month November and lowest at Month The week before Christmas.
There is a difference of 29.0 between the maximum Month November and minimum Month The week before Christmas.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Share of respondents for 6 number of Months.
Month November has the highest Share of respondents and The week before Christmas has the lowest Share of respondents.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The Share of respondents is highest at Month November and lowest at Month The week before Christmas.
There is a difference of 29.0 between the maximum Month November and minimum Month The week before Christmas.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Share of respondents in the y axis.
The maximum Share of respondents 31.0 is found at Month November and the minimum is found at The week before Christmas where Month is 2.0.
The highest Month November has 29.0 more Share of respondents than the lowest Month The week before Christmas.
The Month November has the highest Share of respondents, followed by Alredy bought presents, and December. Down to the Month The week before Christmas which is the lowest.
The Share of respondents has declined over the past 6 Months.
Month October, and December have a similar Share of respondents that is 17.0.
Considered together, the average Share of respondents in all 6 Months is roughly 16.67.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 100.0.
